name: i18n-dashboard
description: ## TODO: - How to define a locale?     ```typescript     type StringFunction = {         (...params: any): string     }     export type StringValue = {         [key: string]: string | StringFunction | AnyComponent | ComponentConstructor     };     ```     - Make sure all locales use the same definition for a key. Eg. the key `test` for `en` is defined as         ```typescript         "test": (name: string) => `Hello ${name}!`         ```         then it must be defined as a function with 1 parameter for all locales.     - When we use a component as a value we must define the file as `.tsx`/`.jsx`.
